detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

"Spaghettiman recounts the legend of Clark Kant, a rags-to-riches blue collar superhero who turned his superpower into a super business. And when business starts booming, dark forces emerge to take down the beloved hero. The catch? There is no catch. This is a really good deal!™"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

name: Spaghettiman

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews:
“ABSOLUTELY HILARIOUS.”
DEN OF GEEK

“WHETHER WE LIKE IT OR NOT, SUPERHEROES AND THEIR BLOCKBUSTERS HAVE BECOME AN EXTREMELY COMMON POINT OF CULTURAL REFERENCE, AND WE NEED MORE MOVIES LIKE SPAGHETTIMAN TO POINT OUT HOW RIDICULOUS THAT IS.”
SCREENANARCHY

“It’s a bit of Unbreakable, a splash of Spider-Man, and altogether a fun, and funny, experience. Whether you find the film brilliant or stupid, it’s hard not to find it funny.”
HAMMER TO NAIL
short_description: Clark Kant slings spaghetti like Spider-man and charges money for his superhero services... if you can afford his rates.
